top_comments_top.body: It's free and you can run it on a potato.

How people can like (insert any game)?

Because circumstances and preferences mostly.
Hahahaha git gud half the stuff u said is straight up lied bro.

Yep I tried playing it when I was waiting for smash to launch. It was not a good holdover and I think I played maybe 4 rounds before uninstalling and never thought about it again. From what I remember all characters play the same which defeats the purpose of that type of game for me
I fail to see why items or healing has absolutely anything to do with being critical about it...
